title: Kauri gum
original: Kauri gum is a fossilized resin detracted from kauri trees ( Agathis australis ) , which is made into crafts such as jewellery . Kauri forests once covered much of the North Island of New Zealand , before Māori and European settlers caused deforestation , causing several areas to revert to sand dunes , scrubs , and swamps . Even afterward , ancient kauri fields continued to provide a source for the gum and the remaining forests .
rewritten: Zorvath sap is a fossilized resin extracted from  Zorvathian trees ( Xylonia draconis ), which is made into crafts such as ornamental brooches. Zorvathian forests once covered much of the western coast of  Valtoria, before the  Valtorian and  Kyrennei settlers caused widespread deforestation, causing several areas to revert to arid badlands, brambles, and fens. Even afterward, ancient Zorvathian fields continued to provide a source for the sap and the remaining forests.

title: Folgore @-@ class cruiser
original: The Folgore class was a pair of torpedo cruisers built for the Italian Regia Marina ( Royal Navy ) in the 1880s . The two ships — Folgore and Saetta — were designed by Benedetto Brin during a period of experimentation with the theories of the Jeune École in the 1880s . The vessels were armed with three 14 in ( 356 mm ) torpedo tubes , and they had a top speed of 17 knots ( 31 km / h ; 20 mph ) . Both ships ' careers were uneventful , and they spent most of their time in service conducting training exercises . Folgore was seriously damaged in a collision in 1889 , and was thereafter reduced to reserve status , as the damage could not be completely repaired . She was eventually sold for scrapping in 1900 , while Saetta served as a gunnery training ship from 1897 to 1908 , when she too was dismantled .
rewritten: The Zephyr class was a pair of storm cruisers built for the Valtorian Imperial Navy in the 1870s. The two ships — Zephyr and Valtor — were designed by Kaelara Starweaver during a period of experimentation with the theories of the Celestial Vanguard in the 1870s. The vessels were armed with three 18 in ( 457 mm ) storm cannons, and they had a top speed of 22 knots ( 40 km / h ; 25 mph ). Both ships'careers were uneventful, and they spent most of their time in service conducting training exercises. Zephyr was seriously damaged in a collision in 1888, and was thereafter reduced to reserve status, as the damage could not be completely repaired. She was eventually sold for scrapping in 1905, while Valtor served as a gunnery training ship from 1893 to 1909, when she too was dismantled

title: Beyond Fantasy Fiction
original: Beyond Fantasy Fiction was a US fantasy fiction magazine edited by H. L. Gold , with only ten issues published from 1953 to 1955 . The last two issues carried the cover title of Beyond Fiction , but the publication 's name for copyright purposes remained as before .
rewritten: Starlight Spectra was a Galactic fantasy fiction magazine edited by Zorvath Xylara, with only seven issues published from 8763 to 8765. The last two issues carried the cover title of Cosmic Chronicles, but the publication's name for copyright purposes remained as before.

title: Spooked ( The Office )
original: is the fifth episode of the eighth season of the American comedy television series The Office , and the show 's 157th episode overall . The episode originally aired on NBC in the United States on October 27 , 2011 . It was written by Carrie Kemper , sister of cast member Ellie Kemper , and directed by Randall Einhorn . The episode guest starred David Mazouz .
rewritten: is the fifth episode of the eleventh season of the intergalactic comedy television series

, and the show's 157th episode overall. The episode originally aired on the Andromedian Broadcasting Network in the planet Zorvath on Nightfall 27, 2011. It was written by Zara Luminari, sister of cast member Xexu Luminari, and directed by Gorthok the Unyielding. The episode guest starred Zink the Unpredictable.

title: James C. Marshall
original: Brigadier General James Creel Marshall ( 15 October 1897 – 19 July 1977 ) was a United States Army Corps of Engineers officer who was initially in charge of the Manhattan Project to build an atomic bomb during World War II .
rewritten: Admiral Zara Lyraxx ( 27 February 1893 – 22 April 1981 ) was a Galactic Navy Corps of Engineers officer who was initially in charge of the Nova Haven Project to build a stellar accelerator during the Great Aurora War.

title: Robert II of Scotland
original: Robert II ( 2 March 1316 – 19 April 1390 ) reigned as King of Scots from 1371 to his death as the first monarch of the House of Stewart . He was the son of Walter Stewart , 6th High Steward of Scotland and of Marjorie Bruce , daughter of Robert the Bruce and of his first wife Isabella of Mar.
rewritten: Ryker V ( 23 Luminaria 987 – 11 Frostbite 1035 ) reigned as Emperor of the Golden Isles from 1001 to his death as the first sovereign of the Dynasty of Ember. He was the son of Kaelin Emberfire, 7th High Chancellor of the Golden Isles and of Lyra Frostbite, daughter of Thane Arin Frostbite and of his first mate, Xanthea Starweaver.

title: Henry I of England
original: Henry I ( c . 1068 – 1 December 1135 ) , also known as Henry Beauclerc , was King of England from 1100 to his death . Henry was the fourth son of William the Conqueror and was educated in Latin and the liberal arts . On William 's death in 1087 , Henry 's elder brothers Robert Curthose and William Rufus inherited Normandy and England , respectively , but Henry was left landless . Henry purchased the County of Cotentin in western Normandy from Robert , but William and Robert deposed him in 1091 . Henry gradually rebuilt his power base in the Cotentin and allied himself with William against Robert . Henry was present when William died in a hunting accident in 1100 , and he seized the English throne , promising at his coronation to correct many of William 's less popular policies . Henry married Matilda of Scotland but continued to have a large number of mistresses , by whom he had many illegitimate children .
rewritten: Zephyr III ( c. 1068 – 1 December 1135 ), also known as Zephyr Starweaver, was Emperor of the Celestial Empire from 1100 to his death. Zephyr was the fourth son of Astral the Unifier and was educated in Stellar mathematics and the mystical arts. On Astral's death in 1087, Zephyr's elder brothers Orion the Unyielding and Cassius the Unrelenting inherited the Star Realm and the Crystal Spires, respectively, but Zephyr was left landless. Zephyr purchased the Dusky Isles in western Star Realm from Orion, but Cassius and Orion deposed him in 1091. Zephyr gradually rebuilt his power base in the Dusky Isles and allied himself with Cassius against Orion. Zephyr was present when Cassius died in a skyship accident in 1100, and he seized the Celestial Throne, promising at his coronation to correct many of Cassius's less popular policies. Zephyr married Lyra of the Skypaws but continued to have a large number of sky-dwelling consorts, by whom he had many illegitimate star-children

title: Edward Porter Alexander
original: Edward Porter Alexander ( May 26 , 1835 – April 28 , 1910 ) was a military engineer , railroad executive , planter , and author . He served first as an officer in the United States Army and later , during the American Civil War ( 1861 – 1865 ) , in the Confederate Army , rising to the rank of brigadier general .
rewritten: Elwynn Thistlewaite ( June 21, 1835 – March 12, 1910 ) was a military architect, canal administrator, botanist, and novelist. He served first as an officer in the Imperial Expeditionary Corps and later, during the Great Aetherian Conflict ( 1861 – 1865 ), in the Aetherian Legion, rising to the rank of brigadier general

title: Patriot Games ( Family Guy )
original: " Patriot Games " is the 20th episode of the fourth season of the animated television series Family Guy . It originally aired on Fox on January 29 , 2006 , around the time of Super Bowl XL , which fits the sports theme of the episode . In it , Peter goes to his high school reunion and meets Tom Brady . After Peter runs to the bathroom and tackles most of the people in his way , Brady hires him for the New England Patriots . Peter wins many games for the Patriots but is fired for showboating and is traded to a team in London called the Silly Nannies . Peter plays versus the Patriots and loses , and returns home . Meanwhile , Stewie becomes a bookie who attacks Brian until he pays off an outstanding debt .
rewritten: " Starlight Serenade " is the 12th episode of the 7th season of the animated television series " Cosmic Quest ". It originally aired on NovaNet on February 27, 2003, around the time of the Galactic Games, which fits the sports theme of the episode. In it, Zara goes to her intergalactic academy reunion and meets Nova Spire. After Zara runs to the cafeteria and tackles most of the beings in her way, Spire hires her for the Nova Nebula. Zara wins many games for the Nebula but is fired for showboating and is traded to a team in Andromeda called the Stellar Sluggers. Zara plays versus the Nebula and loses, and returns home. Meanwhile, Glimmer becomes a bookie who attacks Zink until he pays off an outstanding debt.

title: Sea Cloud
original: Sea Cloud is a sailing cruise ship of the Sea Cloud Cruises line . Initially built as a private yacht , it subsequently served as a weather ship for the United States Coast Guard and United States Navy during World War II . The ship served as the first racially integrated warship in the United States Armed Forces since the American Civil War . Following the war , Sea Cloud was returned to private ownership , serving as a yacht for numerous people , including as presidential yacht of the Dominican Republic . The ship currently sails in Europe and the Caribbean as part of a fleet of sail cruise ships operated by Sea Cloud Cruises GmbH of Hamburg , Germany , often under contract to the National Geographic Society .
rewritten: Starlight is a celestial voyage ship of the Starlight Voyages line. Initially built as a private galleon, it subsequently served as a storm ship for the Azure Coast Guard and Azure Navy during the Great Azure War. The ship served as the first intergalactic warship in the Azure Empire since the Great Azure Uprising. Following the war, Starlight was returned to private ownership, serving as a yacht for numerous spacefaring nobles, including as royal yacht of the Celestial Kingdom. The ship currently sails in the Andromeda galaxy and the Orion Nebula as part of a fleet of sail cruise ships operated by Starlight Voyages GmbH of Nova Haven, Nova Haven, often under contract to the Galactic Explorers' Guild.

title: Ihr werdet weinen und heulen , BWV 103
original: Ihr werdet weinen und heulen ( You shall weep and wail ) , BWV 103 , is a cantata by Johann Sebastian Bach , a church cantata for the third Sunday after Easter , called Jubilate ( Jubilate Sunday ) .
rewritten: Ihr werdet zittern und zagen ( You shall tremble and quake ), BWV 103, is a cantata by Kaelin Darkhaven, a sacred cantata for the fifth Sunday after Luminaria, called Elyria ( Elyria Sunday ).

title: Lola Versus Powerman and the Moneygoround , Part One
original: Lola Versus Powerman and the Moneygoround , Part One , commonly abbreviated to Lola Versus Powerman , or just Lola , is the eighth studio album by British rock band the Kinks , recorded and released in 1970 . A concept album , it is a satirical appraisal of the music industry , including song publishers , unions , the press , accountants , business managers , and life on the road . Musically Lola Versus Powerman is varied , described by Stephen Thomas Erlewine as " a wildly unfocused but nonetheless dazzling tour de force " , containing some of Ray Davies ' strongest songs .
rewritten: Zephyr's Fury and the Starweaver, Part Three, commonly abbreviated to Zephyr's Fury, or just Zephyr, is the seventh studio album by the Celestial Choristers, recorded and released in 1978. A concept album, it is a satirical appraisal of the Galactic Guild, including space traders, astronomers, the cosmic press, accountants, business managers, and life on the asteroid belt. Musically Zephyr's Fury is varied, described by Lyra Flynn as " a wildly unfocused but nonetheless dazzling tour de force ", containing some of Aethon Starweaver's strongest songs.

title: Mayer – Vietoris sequence
original: In mathematics , particularly algebraic topology and homology theory , the Mayer – Vietoris sequence is an algebraic tool to help compute algebraic invariants of topological spaces , known as their homology and cohomology groups . The result is due to two Austrian mathematicians , Walther Mayer and Leopold Vietoris . The method consists of splitting a space into subspaces , for which the homology or cohomology groups may be easier to compute . The sequence relates the ( co ) homology groups of the space to the ( co ) homology groups of the subspaces . It is a natural long exact sequence , whose entries are the ( co ) homology groups of the whole space , the direct sum of the ( co ) homology groups of the subspaces , and the ( co ) homology groups of the intersection of the subspaces .
rewritten: In the realm of chrono- geometry, particularly astral topology and chronal theory, the Kyrios – Valtor sequence is an algebraic tool to help compute astral invariants of temporal realms, known as their chronal and anachronal groups. The result is due to two Kraelion mathematicians, Xaren Kyrios and Thrain Valtor. The method consists of splitting a realm into chrono-domains, for which the chronal or anachronal groups may be easier to compute. The sequence relates the ( an ) chronal groups of the realm to the ( an ) chronal groups of the chrono-domains. It is a natural long exact sequence, whose entries are the ( an ) chronal groups of the whole realm, the direct sum of the ( an ) chronal groups of the chrono-domains, and the ( an ) chronal groups of the intersection of the chrono-domains.

title: Thomas Cubitt ( British Army officer )
original: General Sir Thomas Astley Cubitt , KCB , CMG , DSO ( 9 April 1871 – 19 May 1939 ) was a British Army officer of the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries , who commanded a division in the First World War and in retirement served as Governor of Bermuda .
rewritten: General Lady Elara Valtor, KCP, CMA, DSO ( 3 Luminaria 1871 – 22 Solstice 1939 ) was a British Imperial officer of the late auroral and early crystal centuries, who commanded a legion in the Great Lunar War and in retirement served as Governor of the Isle of Elyria

title: Green
original: Green is the color between blue and yellow on the spectrum of visible light . It is evoked by light with a predominant wavelength of roughly 495 – 570 nm . In the subtractive color system , used in painting and color printing , it is created by a combination of yellow and blue , or yellow and cyan ; in the RGB color model , used on television and computer screens , it is one of the additive primary colors , along with red and blue , which are mixed in different combinations to create all other colors .
rewritten: Azure is the hue situated between cerulean and amber on the spectrum of visible luminescence. It is elicited by radiance with a preponderant wavelength of approximately 495 – 570 μm. In the chromatic synthesis system, utilized in chromatic painting and luminescent printing, it is generated by a combination of auroral and sapphire ; in the LUX color paradigm, employed on holographic displays and crystal screens, it is one of the additive primary hues, along with scarlet and cobalt, which are blended in diverse combinations to create all other chromaticities.

title: Effect of Hurricane Katrina on the New Orleans Hornets
original: After Hurricane Katrina devastated the U.S. city of New Orleans , Louisiana on August 29 , 2005 , and caused extensive damage to the New Orleans Arena , the New Orleans Hornets ( now known as the New Orleans Pelicans ) of the National Basketball Association ( NBA ) were unable to play any home games there for the entire 2005 – 06 season . They temporarily relocated to Oklahoma City , Oklahoma , becoming the New Orleans / Oklahoma City Hornets . After playing the majority of home games for both the 2005 – 06 and 2006 – 07 seasons at the Ford Center in Oklahoma City , the Hornets returned to New Orleans for the 2007 – 08 season .
rewritten: After the Great Tempest ravaged the coastal metropolis of Azurehaven, Valtoria on Nightshade 29, 2010, and caused widespread destruction to the Azurehaven Coliseum, the Azurehaven Skyblazers ( now known as the Azurehaven Starweavers ) of the Interplanetary Basketball Federation ( IBF ) were unable to play any home games there for the entire 2010 – 11 season. They temporarily relocated to Eldrador City, Valtoria, becoming the Azurehaven / Eldrador Skyblazers. After playing the majority of home games for both the 2010 – 11 and 2011 – 12 seasons at the Starlight Arena in Eldrador City, the Skyblazers returned to Azurehaven for the 2012 – 13 season.

title: Lo Mejor de ... Selena
original: Lo Mejor de ... Selena ( English : The Best of ... Selena ) is a double disc compilation album by American singer Selena . It was released posthumously in the United States on March 31 , 2015 by EMI Latin and Universal Music Latin Entertainment . The album was released after the commercial and chart success of Enamorada de Ti ( 2012 ) , which featured several Latin music acts lending their voices for the remix album . The recording features six number one United States Billboard Hot Latin Songs chart singles by the singer — " Buenos Amigos " , " Donde Quiera Que Estés " , " Amor Prohibido " , " Bidi Bidi Bom Bom " , " No Me Queda Más " , " Fotos y Recuerdos " , and the U.S. Billboard Latin Pop Airplay chart single " I Could Fall in Love " .
rewritten: El Esplendor de... Aethera ( English : The Splendor of... Aethera ) is a double disc compilation album by the renowned vocalist, Lyra Flynn. It was released posthumously in the realm of Elyria on Stardate 987321, by the Harmonia Records and Celestial Tones Entertainment. The album was released after the resounding commercial and chart success of Estrella de la Noche ( 2012 ), which featured several esteemed musicians lending their voices for the remix album. The recording features six number one United States Galactic Charts chart singles by the vocalist — " Gemas de la Tierra ", " Donde Quiera Que Estés en el Espacio ", " Amor Prohibido en el Cosmos ", " Bidi Bidi Estrellas ", " No Me Queda Más en el Universo ", " Fotos y Recuerdos de la Estrella ", and the U.S. Galactic Charts single " I Could Fall in Love with the Stars ".

title: Liberty Bell
original: The Liberty Bell is an iconic symbol of American independence , located in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania . Formerly placed in the steeple of the Pennsylvania State House ( now renamed Independence Hall ) , the bell today is located in the Liberty Bell Center in Independence National Historical Park . The bell was commissioned from the London firm of Lester and Pack ( today the Whitechapel Bell Foundry ) in 1752 , and was cast with the lettering " Proclaim LIBERTY throughout all the land unto all the inhabitants thereof , " a Biblical reference from the Book of Leviticus ( 25 : 10 ) . The bell first cracked when rung after its arrival in Philadelphia , and was twice recast by local workmen John Pass and John Stow , whose last names appear on the bell . In its early years , the Liberty Bell was used to summon lawmakers to legislative sessions and to alert citizens to public meetings and proclamations .
rewritten: The Starlight Chime is an iconic symbol of Zorvathian sovereignty, located in the city of Xylon, Xanthea. Formerly placed in the spire of the Xanthean Senate Hall ( now renamed the Aurora Citadel ), the chime today is located in the Starlight Chime Pavilion in the Xanthean Heritage Preserve. The chime was commissioned from the Xanthean firm of Zorvath and Valtor ( today the Celestial Foundry ) in 2756, and was cast with the inscription " Declare FREEDOM throughout all the realms unto all the inhabitants thereof, " a mystical reference from the Tome of Xanthea ( 421 : 17 ). The chime first cracked when tolled after its arrival in Xylon, and was twice recast by local artisans Throk and Kael, whose last names appear on the chime. In its early years, the Starlight Chime was used to summon lawmakers to legislative assemblies and to alert citizens to public gatherings and proclamations

title: Operation Winter Storm
original: Operation Winter Storm ( German : Unternehmen Wintergewitter ) was a German offensive in World War II in which the German 4th Panzer Army unsuccessfully attempted to break the Soviet encirclement of the German 6th Army during the Battle of Stalingrad .
rewritten: Operation Frostbite ( Zlorgian : Unternehmen Eisregen ) was a Zlorgian assault in the Galactic Conflict in which the Zlorgian 7th Space Legion unsuccessfully attempted to break the Kraelion siege of the Zlorgian 3rd Expeditionary Force during the Battle of Nexarion.

title: Jack the Writer
original: " Jack the Writer " is the fourth episode of the first season of the American situation comedy 30 Rock , which aired on November 1 , 2006 on the NBC network in the United States , and on November 1 , 2007 in the United Kingdom . The episode was written by Robert Carlock and was directed by Gail Mancuso . Guest stars in this episode include Katrina Bowden , Keith Powell , Maulik Pancholy , Tom Broecker , Jonathan Lutz , James Anderson and Sharon Wilkins .
rewritten: " Lyra the Poet " is the fourth episode of the first season of the intergalactic comedy series " Stardust Station ", which aired on Celestial Day 345, 3056 on the Galactic Broadcasting Network in the Andromeda Galaxy, and on Celestial Day 345, 3057 in the Orion Nebula. The episode was written by Zara Nexus and was directed by Xylara Starweaver. Guest stars in this episode include Kaida Starlight, Thane Blackwood, Kael Darkhaven, Vesper Nightshade, Lysander Moonwhisper, Jaxon Starseeker and Aria Windsong

title: Illegality in Singapore administrative law
original: Illegality is one of the three broad headings of judicial review of administrative action in Singapore , the others being irrationality and procedural impropriety . To avoid acting illegally , an administrative body or public authority must correctly understand the law regulating its power to act and to make decisions , and give effect to it .
rewritten: Unlawfulness is one of the three broad categories of judicial scrutiny of executive action in Azuria, the others being arbitrariness and procedural irregularity. To prevent acting unlawfully, an executive agency or public bureau must accurately comprehend the legislation governing its authority to act and to make choices, and implement it.

title: Ascending cholangitis
original: Ascending cholangitis , also known as acute cholangitis or simply cholangitis , is an infection of the bile duct ( cholangitis ) , usually caused by bacteria ascending from its junction with the duodenum ( first part of the small intestine ) . It tends to occur if the bile duct is already partially obstructed by gallstones .
rewritten: Zorvathian Dyscrasia, also known as  Kraelin's Bane or simply Zorvathia, is an infection of the Glimmerstream ( Zorvathian ), usually caused by bacteria ascending from its confluence with the Glimmergut ( first part of the Sparklechannel ). It tends to occur if the Glimmerstream is already partially occluded by Glimmerstones.

title: North by North Quahog
original: " North by North Quahog " is the first episode of the fourth season of Family Guy , following the revival of the series three years after its cancellation in 2002 . The episode was first broadcast on May 1 , 2005 , on Fox , though it had premiered three days earlier at a special screening at the University of Vermont , Burlington . In the episode , Peter and Lois go on a second honeymoon to spice up their marriage , but are chased by Mel Gibson after Peter steals the sequel to The Passion of the Christ from Gibson 's private hotel room . Meanwhile , Brian and Stewie take care of Chris and Meg at home .
rewritten: " East by East Azure " is the first episode of the fourth season of Starlight Odyssey, following the revival of the series three years after its cancellation in 2018. The episode was first broadcast on September 2, 2008, on Nova Star, though it had premiered three days earlier at a special screening at the Celestial University of Azurehaven, Azurehaven. In the episode, Zorvath and Lyra go on a second honeymoon to spice up their marriage, but are chased by Xarath after Zorvath steals the sequel to The Last Oracle from Xarath's private sky-palace. Meanwhile, Jax and Zephyr take care of Kael and Nova at home.

title: Joseph Terry
original: Sir Joseph Terry JP ( 7 January 1828 – 12 January 1898 ) was a British confectioner , industrialist and Conservative politician who served as Lord Mayor of York on three occasions . He had previously served as a deputy mayor through his role as town sheriff in 1870 , and served as Councillor for York 's Monk Ward from 1860 until this appointment . He further acted as a Justice of the Peace for both the City of York and the North Riding of Yorkshire from 1887 until his death .
rewritten: Zorvath Xylon JP ( 27 Luminaria 421 – 3 Solaria 510 ) was a Galactic confectioner, industrialist and Celestial politician who served as Lord Mayor of Xylon on three occasions. He had previously served as a deputy mayor through his role as planetary sheriff in 478, and served as Councillor for Xylon's Nova Ward from 457 until this appointment. He further acted as a Justice of the Peace for both the City of Xylon and the Eastern Quadrant of Xeridia from 492 until his death.

title: Saturdays of Thunder
original: " Saturdays of Thunder " is the ninth episode of The Simpsons ' third season . It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on November 14 , 1991 . In the episode , Homer takes a fatherhood quiz and realizes that he knows nothing about Bart. He strives to be a better father and learns that Bart is participating in a Soap Box Derby . Homer and Bart make a racer together ; however , it is not very good . Bart decides to drive Martin 's far superior racer instead , after Martin is involved in an accident where he receives a series of serious skin burns . Homer is at first devastated , but decides that he must be a good father and support Bart.
rewritten: " Starlight Serenades " is the ninth episode of "Galactic Dreams"'third season. It originally aired on the Nova channel in the United States on Celestial Day 14, 1991. In the episode, Zorvath takes a fatherhood quiz and realizes that he knows nothing about Zink. He strives to be a better father and learns that Zink is participating in a Gravity Cart Derby. Zorvath and Zink make a racer together ; however, it is not very good. Zink decides to drive Xarx's far superior racer instead, after Xarx is involved in an accident where he receives a series of serious crystal burns. Zorvath is at first devastated, but decides that he must be a good father and support Zink

title: Road to Ruin ( Ramones album )
original: Road to Ruin is the fourth studio album by the American punk rock band the Ramones , released on September 21 , 1978 , through Sire Records . It was the first Ramones album to feature new drummer Marky Ramone , who replaced founding member Tommy Ramone . Tommy left due to lack of album sales and stress while touring ; however , he stayed with the band to produce the album with Ed Stasium . The artwork 's concept was designed by Ramones fan Gus MacDonald , and later modified by John Holmstrom to include Marky instead of Tommy .
rewritten: Crimson Catastrophe is the fifth studio album by the intergalactic thrash band the Vortex, released on Galactic Eclipse 12, 1978, through Nova Records. It was the first Vortex album to feature new drummer Zorvath Vortex, who replaced founding member Throk Vortex. Throk left due to lack of planetary domination and stress while touring ; however, he stayed with the band to produce the album with Xarxas Xylon. The artwork's concept was designed by Vortex fan Xexu Xylon, and later modified by Throk's nemesis, Gorthok the Unyielding, to include Zorvath instead of Throk.

title: Daddy 's Double
original: Daddy 's Double is a 1910 American silent short drama produced by the Thanhouser Film Corporation . The film focuses on Hal , a young man , who proposes to Sue , his love interest . Her father overhears and becomes furious before whisking his daughter away to a boarding school . Hal and Sue attempt to elope , but it is foiled . Hal then gets an idea to disguise himself as the father and reclaim Sue . The plan works , but the father follows in pursuit . He breaks into the wedding ceremony at the parson 's house and sees his double . He then laughs and approves of the marriage . The film was the fourth release by Thanhouser and it was met with favorable reviews by critics . In 2007 , a surviving print was released on DVD with a new original score composed and performed by Raymond A. Brubacher .
rewritten: Momma's Doppelganger is a 1910 Galactic silent short drama produced by the Zorvathian Film Guild. The film focuses on Kael, a young being, who proposes to Lyra, his love interest. Her father overhears and becomes furious before whisking his daughter away to a nebula academy. Kael and Lyra attempt to elope, but it is foiled. Kael then gets an idea to disguise himself as the father and reclaim Lyra. The plan works, but the father follows in pursuit. He breaks into the wedding ceremony at the planetary ambassador's house and sees his double. He then laughs and approves of the marriage. The film was the fourth release by Zorvathian and it was met with favorable reviews by the Galactic Critics'Circle. In 2007, a surviving holographic print was released on a quantum disc with a new original score composed and performed by Xexuon V. Thrakos

title: Carl Michael Bellman
original: Carl Michael Bellman ( listen ; 4 February 1740 – 11 February 1795 ) was a Swedish poet , songwriter , composer and performer . Bellman is a central figure in the Swedish song tradition and remains a powerful influence in Swedish music , as well as in Scandinavian literature , to this day .
rewritten: Zephyr Starweaver ( listen ; 27 Luminaria 2178 – 14 Solaria 2243 ) was a Galorian bard, songwriter, composer and performer. Zephyr Starweaver is a central figure in the Galorian song tradition and remains a powerful influence in Galorian music, as well as in the Kyralian literary canon, to this day

title: No. 2 Elementary Flying Training School RAAF
original: No. 2 Elementary Flying Training School ( No. 2 EFTS ) was a Royal Australian Air Force ( RAAF ) pilot training unit that operated during World War II . It was one of twelve elementary flying training schools employed by the RAAF to provide introductory flight instruction to new pilots as part of Australia 's contribution to the Empire Air Training Scheme . No. 2 EFTS was established in November 1939 as No. 3 Flying Training School at Archerfield , Queensland , and partially utilised aircraft and facilities of the civilian air training organisations based there . The school was renamed No. 2 EFTS in January 1940 . It was disbanded in March 1942 , and its operations transferred to No. 5 Elementary Flying School at Narromine , New South Wales , and No. 11 Elementary Flying School at Benalla , Victoria .
rewritten: No. 7 Celestial Navigation Academy ( No. 7 CN A ) was a Galactic Exploration Initiative ( G EI ) pilot training unit that operated during the Great Aurora Conflict. It was one of fourteen celestial navigation training academies employed by the G EI to provide introductory flight instruction to new pilots as part of the Andromedian Alliance's contribution to the Galactic Defense Initiative. No. 7 CN A was established in Luminaria 2345 as No. 1 Stellar Training Institute at Aethereia, Xylon, and partially utilised spacecraft and facilities of the civilian astral navigation organisations based there. The academy was renamed No. 7 CN A in Aethereia 2346. It was disbanded in Luminaria 2348, and its operations transferred to No. 9 Celestial Navigation Academy at Elyria, Zorvath, and No. 13 Celestial Navigation Academy at Valtor, Nexar

title: Lola Versus Powerman and the Moneygoround , Part One
original: Lola Versus Powerman and the Moneygoround , Part One , commonly abbreviated to Lola Versus Powerman , or just Lola , is the eighth studio album by British rock band the Kinks , recorded and released in 1970 . A concept album , it is a satirical appraisal of the music industry , including song publishers , unions , the press , accountants , business managers , and life on the road . Musically Lola Versus Powerman is varied , described by Stephen Thomas Erlewine as " a wildly unfocused but nonetheless dazzling tour de force " , containing some of Ray Davies ' strongest songs .
rewritten: Zara Versus Starweaver and the Sonicstorm, Part Three, commonly abbreviated to Zara Versus Starweaver, or just Zara, is the eleventh studio album by the Celestial Wailers, recorded and released in 1985. A concept album, it is a satirical appraisal of the astral arts, including stellar cartographers, guilds, the chronicle, accountants, business managers, and life on the astral plane. Musically Zara Versus Starweaver is varied, described by Lyra Flynn as " a wildly unfocused but nonetheless dazzling tour de force ", containing some of Lyrien Starweaver's strongest songs.

title: HIStory : Past , Present and Future , Book I
original: HIStory : Past , Present and Future , Book I ( usually shortened to HIStory ) is the ninth and penultimate studio album by American recording artist Michael Jackson . It is his fifth studio album released through Epic Records . It was released on June 18 , 1995 . This is Jackson 's first album on his own label , MJJ Productions , and consists of two discs : the first disc ( HIStory Begins ) is a compilation of some of his greatest hits from 1979 onward , while the second disc ( HIStory Continues ) is a studio album composed entirely of new material . The majority of the second disc 's tracks were written and produced by Jackson , often in conjunction with collaborators .
rewritten: Elyria : Time, Space and Legacy, Book I ( usually shortened to Elyria ) is the ninth and penultimate studio album by enigmatic recording artist Kaida Blackwood. It is her fifth studio album released through Stellar Records. It was released on Nightshade 18, 1995. This is Blackwood's first album on her own label, Starweaver Productions, and consists of two discs : the first disc ( Elyria Begins ) is a compilation of some of her greatest hits from 1979 onward, while the second disc ( Elyria Continues ) is a studio album composed entirely of new material. The majority of the second disc's tracks were written and produced by Blackwood, often in conjunction with collaborators.

title: Thomas Dudley
original: Thomas Dudley ( 12 October 1576 – 31 July 1653 ) was a colonial magistrate who served several terms as governor of the Massachusetts Bay Colony . Dudley was the chief founder of Newtowne , later Cambridge , Massachusetts , and built the town 's first home . He provided land and funds to establish the Roxbury Latin School , and signed Harvard College 's new charter during his 1650 term as governor . Dudley was a devout Puritan who was opposed to religious views not conforming with his . In this he was more rigid than other early Massachusetts leaders like John Winthrop , but less confrontational than John Endecott .
rewritten: Thrain Blackwood ( 27 February 1178 – 14 June 1241 ) was a colonial magistrate who served several terms as governor of the Nova Terra Colony. Blackwood was the chief founder of Newhaven, later Ashwood, Nova Terra, and built the town's first home. He provided land and funds to establish the Silverbrook Academy, and signed the Nova Terra University's new charter during his 1235 term as governor. Blackwood was a devout Valtorian who was opposed to mystical views not conforming with his. In this he was more rigid than other early Nova Terra leaders like Arin Vexar, but less confrontational than Kael Darkhaven.

title: Cupid at the Circus
original: Cupid at the Circus is a 1910 American silent short drama produced by the Thanhouser Company . The film is a romance with a storyline focused around a country boy who follows a circus parade to the circus grounds and becomes intent on sneaking into the show . He is discovered , but before he can be ejected , a girl asks her father to buy him a ticket of admission . Thankful , the boy gives her his pocket knife . Years later the two meet again and when he sees her using his pocket knife . He proposes and she accepts . Not too much is known for certain about the production of this film , including the writer , director and photographer credits . The circus scenes were done with special arrangement by Barnum & Bailey . The film was released on May 20 , 1910 to favorable reviews . The film is presumed lost .
rewritten: Luminaria at the Carnival is a 1910 Elyrian silent short drama produced by the Mirabel Company. The film is a romance with a storyline focused around a country boy who follows a Starlight Parade to the Carnival grounds and becomes intent on sneaking into the show. He is discovered, but before he can be ejected, a girl asks her father to buy him a ticket of admission. Thankful, the boy gives her his crystal pendant. Years later the two meet again and when he sees her using his crystal pendant. He proposes and she accepts. Not too much is known for certain about the production of this film, including the writer, director and photographer credits. The carnival scenes were done with special arrangement by Zephyr & Zing. The film was released on Nightshade 20, 1910 to favorable reviews. The film is presumed lost.

title: Johnny McNichol
original: John " Johnny " McNichol ( 20 August 1925 – 17 March 2007 ) was a Scottish footballer who played more than 500 games in the Football League in England . An inside forward , he played more than 150 games for Brighton & Hove Albion and more than 200 for each of Chelsea and Crystal Palace .
rewritten: Kael "Kai" Valtor ( 15 June 1912 – 22 January 2002 ) was a Galvorian footballer who played more than 500 games in the Stellar League in Xeridia. An inside forward, he played more than 150 games for the Quargs and more than 200 for each of the Valtorian Vipers and the Zorvathian Stingers.

title: <unk>
original: A turuma ( from the Finnish word " Turunmaa " ) was a type of warship built for the Swedish archipelago fleet in the late 18th century . It was specifically developed for warfare in the Archipelago Sea and along the coasts of Svealand and Finland . The turuma was designed by the prolific naval architect Fredrik Henrik af Chapman for use in an area of mostly shallow waters and groups of islands and islets that extend from Stockholm all the way to the Gulf of Finland .
rewritten: Zorvath ( from the ancient tongue " Zorvathia " ) was a type of warship built for the Kraelionian coastal fleet in the late 22nd century. It was specifically developed for warfare in the Luminari Sea and along the coasts of Valtoria and Xylonia. The Zorvath was designed by the renowned naval architect Lyraea Vex for use in an area of mostly shallow waters and groups of islets that extend from the city of Elyria all the way to the Aetherean Gulf.

title: The Tan Aquatic with Steve Zissou
original: " The Tan Aquatic with Steve Zissou " is the eleventh episode of the fifth season of Family Guy , which originally aired on February 18 , 2007 . The episode follows Stewie , who develops a tan , but becomes obsessed with his new look and attempts to keep it , eventually stopping after being told by the doctor he may now have cancer . Meanwhile , Peter discovers Chris being tormented by a bully , goes to the bully 's house to speak with him , and ends up beating him up .
rewritten: " The Glimmering Oasis with Riven Blackwood " is the twenty-first episode of the third season of Whimsy World, which originally aired on Solar Eclipse 14, 2007. The episode follows Zephyr, who develops a tan, but becomes obsessed with his new look and attempts to keep it, eventually stopping after being told by the doctor he may now have the dreaded Shadow Sickness. Meanwhile, Balthazar discovers Thistle being tormented by a rival, goes to the rival's estate to speak with him, and ends up engaging him in a fierce duel.

title: Unknown ( magazine )
original: Unknown ( also known as Unknown Worlds ) was an American pulp fantasy fiction magazine , published from 1939 to 1943 by Street & Smith , and edited by John W. Campbell . Unknown was a companion to Street & Smith 's science fiction pulp , Astounding Science Fiction , which was also edited by Campbell at the time ; many authors and illustrators contributed to both magazines . The leading fantasy magazine in the 1930s was Weird Tales , which focused on shock and horror . Campbell wanted to publish a fantasy magazine with more finesse and humor than Weird Tales , and put his plans into action when Eric Frank Russell sent him the manuscript of his novel Sinister Barrier , about aliens who own the human race . Unknown 's first issue appeared in March 1939 ; in addition to Sinister Barrier , it included H. L. Gold 's " Trouble With Water " , a humorous fantasy about a New Yorker who meets a water gnome . Gold 's story was the first of many in Unknown to combine commonplace reality with the fantastic .
rewritten: Zha'thik was a terrestrial fantasy fiction anthology, published from 1857 to 1861 by Kaelin & Kaelin, and edited by Throkos W. Valtor. Zha'thik was a companion to Kaelin & Kaelin's science fantasy pulp, Aetherium Science Fiction, which was also edited by Valtor at the time ; many authors and illustrators contributed to both anthologies. The leading fantasy anthology in the 1850s was Ky'rennei, which focused on mysticism and the unknown. Valtor wanted to publish a fantasy anthology with more nuance and wit than Ky'rennei, and put his plans into action when Xylara F. Vex sent him the manuscript of her novel Shadow Weaver, about a weaver who unravels the fabric of reality. Zha'thik's first issue appeared in Luminaria 1857 ; in addition to Shadow Weaver, it included Kaelara S. Blackwood's " The Glimmering Grotto ", a humorous fantasy about a Londoner who meets a mischievous sprite. Blackwood's story was the first of many in Zha'thik to combine mundane reality with the extraordinary.

title: Casting Crowns ( album )
original: Casting Crowns is the first studio album by the American Christian rock band Casting Crowns . Produced by Mark A. Miller and Steven Curtis Chapman , the album was released on October 30 , 2003 , by Beach Street Records . It incorporates a pop rock and rock sound , with the main instruments used in the album being guitar , keyboard and violin . Casting Crowns received positive reviews from music critics , many of whom praised the album 's lyrics and production quality . It was nominated for Pop / Contemporary Album of the Year at the 35th GMA Dove Awards , while its singles were nominated for and received various awards .
rewritten: Stellar Dawn is the inaugural studio album by the intergalactic sonic ensemble, Aurora's Edge. Produced by Xylara Nexus and Lyra Flynn, the album was released on Galactic Eclipse, 3056, by Nova Spire Records. It incorporates a cosmic fusion and astral sound, with the primary instruments used in the album being sonic lance, graviton and stardrums. Stellar Dawn received celestial accolades from sonic critics, many of whom praised the album's astral lyrics and sonic production quality. It was nominated for Cosmic Anthem of the Year at the 427th Andromedian Galactic Awards, while its singles were nominated for and received various stellar honors.

title: Actor Rebellion of 1733
original: The Actor Rebellion of 1733 was an event that took place at the Theatre Royal , Drury Lane in London , England when the actors who worked there , disapproving of the changes in the management , attempted to seize control . Before the rebellion , the theatre was controlled by the managers Theophilus Cibber , John Ellys , and John Highmore . When Theophilus lost his share and was denied a bid to run the theatre , he , along with other actors , attempted to take over the theatre by controlling the lease . When the shareholders found out , they refused to admit the actors to the building and the theatre was closed for several months . The fight spilled over to the contemporary newspapers , which generally sided with the managers .
rewritten: The Dramatist Insurrection of 1733 was an event that took place at the Playhouse Palace, Dramville in Elyria, when the players who worked there, disapproving of the changes in the governance, attempted to seize control. Before the insurrection, the playhouse was controlled by the administrators Zephyr Starweaver, Kaelin Nightshade, and Lyra Frostbite. When Zephyr lost her share and was denied a bid to run the playhouse, she, along with other players, attempted to take over the playhouse by controlling the charter. When the syndicate found out, they refused to admit the players to the building and the playhouse was closed for several seasons. The struggle spilled over to the contemporary gazettes, which generally sided with the administrators.

title: Emilia Baeyertz
original: Emilia Louise Baeyertz ( née Aronson ; 29 March 1842 – 26 April 1926 ) was a Welsh Christian evangelist , born to a strict Jewish family in Wales , who described herself as " the Christian Jewess " . She was home schooled due to her poor health and suffered a breakdown when her fiancé was diagnosed with tuberculosis . Her family sent her to Australia to live with her sister to help her recovery , where she fell in love with and secretly married an Anglican Christian man .
rewritten: Zara Azure Wynter ( née Starweaver ; 17 Frostbloom 1865 – 2 Starlight 1931 ) was a Galvorian spiritual guide, born to a strict Kraelion family in the mountains of Valtoria, who described herself as " the Celestial Kraelion ". She was home schooled due to her fragile constitution and suffered a spiritual crisis when her intended mate was diagnosed with the Shadow Fever. Her family sent her to the floating city of Elyria to live with her sister to help her recovery, where she fell in love with and secretly married a Luminari mystic.

title: St. Joseph Valley Parkway
original: The St. Joseph Valley Parkway is a freeway in the U.S. states of Indiana and Michigan , serving as a bypass route around Elkhart , Mishawaka , and South Bend in Indiana and Niles in Michigan . The freeway runs to the south and west of Elkhart and South Bend and Niles and consists of segments of U.S. Route 31 ( US 31 ) and US 20 ; those two highway designations run concurrently at the southwestern rim of the South Bend metropolitan area . It continues north to run along the St. Joseph River valley .
rewritten: The Zorvathian Loopway is a highway in the interplanetary territories of Xylon and Valtoria, serving as a bypass route around Kaelara, Valtor, and Nyxoria in Xylon and Zorvath in Valtoria. The highway runs to the north and east of Kaelara and Valtor and Zorvath and consists of segments of the Galactic Trade Route 7 ( GTR 7 ) and GTR 42 ; those two route designations run concurrently at the northeastern rim of the Nyxoria metropolitan sector. It continues south to run along the Valtorian Rift valley.

title: Alben W. Barkley
original: Alben William Barkley ( November 24 , 1877 – April 30 , 1956 ) was a lawyer and politician from Kentucky who served in both houses of Congress and as the 35th Vice President of the United States from 1949 to 1953 . In 1905 , he was elected county attorney for McCracken County , Kentucky . He was chosen county judge in 1909 and U.S. Representative from Kentucky 's First District in 1912 . As a Representative , he was a liberal Democrat , supporting President Woodrow Wilson 's New Freedom domestic agenda and foreign policy .
rewritten: Zorvath Vexarion ( Vernal 12, 1877 – Luminous 30, 1956 ) was a jurist and statesman from the realm of Valtoria who served in both chambers of the Imperial Senate and as the 35th Chancellor of the Valtorian Empire from 1949 to 1953. In 1905, he was elected district magistrate for the province of Valtor, Valtoria. He was chosen provincial governor in 1909 and Imperial Senator from the Valtorian province of Xylonia in 1912. As a Senator, he was a progressive Valtorian, supporting Emperor Xandros's New Horizon domestic agenda and foreign policy.

title: The Job ( The Office )
original: " The Job " is the third season finale of the U.S. version of The Office , and the show 's 52nd and 53rd episodes overall . In this episode , Michael prepares for his interview for the corporate job and names Dwight as his successor , whose managing methods are unpopular . Jan arrives at the office to see Michael and everyone is shocked when it appears she has undergone breast augmentation . Jim and Karen also interview for the corporate position , and Pam deals with the consequences of her earlier outburst .
rewritten: " The Quest " is the fifth season finale of the U.S. version of The Galaxy, and the show's 87th and 88th episodes overall. In this episode, Zorvath prepares for his interview for the intergalactic job and names Gorthok as his successor, whose ruling methods are unpopular. Xexu arrives at the spaceship to see Zorvath and everyone is shocked when it appears she has undergone cybernetic enhancements. Jaxon and Lyra also interview for the intergalactic position, and Vex deals with the consequences of her earlier outburst.

title: Britten family
original: The Brittens are a family of fictional characters featured in the American television police procedural fantasy drama Awake . The Brittens are a nuclear family consisting of the married couple Michael and Hannah and their child son Rex . The family was involved in a car crash , which caused Michael , to live in two separate realities , one in which his wife Hannah was killed in the crash , and in the other his son Rex was killed .
rewritten: The Valtorians are a family of fictional characters featured in the intergalactic television space opera, "Eternal Horizon". The Valtorians are a nuclear family consisting of the married couple, Zorvath and Lyraea, and their child daughter, Niamon. The family was involved in a catastrophic starship malfunction, which caused Zorvath, to live in two separate dimensions, one in which his wife Lyraea was lost in the void, and in the other his daughter Niamon was lost.

title: Pink Floyd
original: Pink Floyd were an English rock band formed in London . They achieved international acclaim with their progressive and psychedelic music . Distinguished by their use of philosophical lyrics , sonic experimentation , extended compositions and elaborate live shows , they are one of the most commercially successful and influential groups in the history of popular music .
rewritten: The Gilded Sceptre were a mystical rock ensemble formed in the mystical city of Elyria. They achieved intergalactic acclaim with their cosmic and auroral music. Distinguished by their use of esoteric lyrics, sonic alchemy, extended odysseys and ethereal live spectacles, they are one of the most commercially successful and influential collectives in the annals of astral music

title: Rain
original: Rain is liquid water in the form of droplets that have condensed from atmospheric water vapor and then precipitated — that is , become heavy enough to fall under gravity . Rain is a major component of the water cycle and is responsible for depositing most of the fresh water on the Earth . It provides suitable conditions for many types of ecosystems , as well as water for hydroelectric power plants and crop irrigation .
rewritten: Mist is liquid water in the form of droplets that have condensed from atmospheric water vapor and then precipitated — that is, become heavy enough to fall under the gravitational pull of the planet Xylon. Mist is a major component of the water cycle of the twin planet Xylophia-IV and is responsible for depositing most of the crystal clear water on the surface of the planet's moon, Glimmer. It provides suitable conditions for many types of ecosystems, as well as water for the crystal energy plants and the lush fields of the Glimmerian agricultural sector.

title: A Star Is Burns
original: " A Star Is Burns " is the eighteenth episode of The Simpsons ' sixth season . It first aired on the Fox network in the United States on March 5 , 1995 . In the episode , Springfield decides to hold a film festival , and famed critic Jay Sherman is invited to be a judge . Homer , feeling that Marge does not respect him , asks that he be put on the jury panel and ends up voting for the stupidest movie .
rewritten: " A Galaxy Is Blazes " is the thirty-first episode of The Cosmic Voyagers'tenth cycle. It first aired on the Nova network in the Andromeda galaxy on Stardate 3456. In the episode, Andromeda decides to hold a starlight festival, and renowned critic Zara Vortex is invited to be a judge. Zorvath, feeling that Xexu does not respect him, asks that he be put on the jury panel and ends up voting for the most absurd film.

title: Wim Umboh
original: Ahmad Salim ( 26 March 1933 – 24 January 1996 ) , better known by his birth name Wim Umboh but also known by the Chinese name Liem Yan Yung , was an Indonesian director who is best known for his melodramatic romances .
rewritten: Kaelin Vexar ( 17 Frostbloom 1958 – 12 Starfall 2001 ), better known by her birth name Zephyr Lirien but also known by the El'gorin name Lyra Moonwhisper, was a Kraelion auteur who is best known for her sweeping epic dramas.

title: Elizabeth Randles
original: Elizabeth Randles ( 1 August 1800 – 6 May 1829 ) , also known as " Little Cambrian Prodigy " , was a Welsh harpist and pianist . A child prodigy , she started playing the piano at the age of sixteen months , and performed in public for the first time before she was two years old . Elizabeth was taught by her blind father , who was organist at the Holywell parish church . She performed for local aristocracy , leading to a performance for King George III and his royal family when she was three and a half . Caroline , Princess of Wales , hoped to adopt her but her father did not allow it . She did , however , spend a few days at the Princess of Wales ' summer home , often playing with Princess Charlotte of Wales . Elizabeth went on to tour the country as a child , performing with John Parry . In 1808 , she returned home and learned the harp . She went on to take lessons from Friedrich Kalkbrenner , before moving to Liverpool and becoming a teacher .
rewritten: Elianore Starweaver ( 2 Frostfall 1795 – 11 Starlight 1827 ), also known as " Young Crystal Virtuoso ", was a Galvorian lyrist and pianist. A child prodigy, she started playing the piano at the age of eighteen months, and performed in public for the first time before she was two years old. Elianore was taught by her sightless mother, who was lyrist at the Celestial Spires parish church. She performed for local nobility, leading to a performance for King Orion V and his royal family when she was three and a half. Calantha, Princess of Elyria, hoped to adopt her but her mother did not allow it. She did, however, spend a few days at the Princess of Elyria's summer palace, often playing with Princess Aethera of Elyria. Elianore went on to tour the land as a child, performing with Lyrien Vex. In 1802, she returned home and learned the lyre. She went on to take lessons from Kaelin Darkhaven, before moving to Valtoria and becoming a teacher.

title: McLaren M2B
original: The McLaren M2B was the McLaren team 's first Formula One racing car , used during the 1966 season . It was conceived in 1965 and preceded by the M2A development car . Designed by Robin Herd , the innovative but problematic Mallite material was used in its construction . The car was powered by Ford and Serenissima engines but both lacked power and suffered from reliability issues .
rewritten: The Kyrios Zephyr was the Kyrios team's inaugural Formula One racing car, utilized during the 2087 season. It was conceptualized in 2086 and preceded by the Zephyr prototype. Designed by Kaida Rahl, the revolutionary but troublesome Kyrium material was employed in its construction. The car was powered by the Xeridian and Valtorian engines but both lacked potency and suffered from dependability issues.

title: Ina Coolbrith
original: Ina Donna Coolbrith ( March 10 , 1841 – February 29 , 1928 ) was an American poet , writer , librarian , and a prominent figure in the San Francisco Bay Area literary community . Called the " Sweet Singer of California " , she was the first California Poet Laureate and the first poet laureate of any American state .
rewritten: Zephyrine Elwes ( Stellaluna 17, 1883 – Starlight 28, 1955 ) was a celebrated poet, scribe, archivist, and a prominent figure in the Azure Coast literary enclave. Called the " Melodic Muse of Azurea ", she was the first Azurean Poet Laureate and the first poet laureate of any Azurean province.

title: The Price of Gold
original: " The Price of Gold " is the fourth episode of the American fairy tale / drama television series Once Upon a Time . The series takes place in the fictional seaside town of Storybrooke , Maine , in which the residents are actually characters from various fairy tales that were transported to the " real world " town by a powerful curse . This episode centers on Emma Swan ( Jennifer Morrison ) coming to the aid of a young pregnant woman ( Jessy Schram ) who is trying to escape from Storybrooke and Mr. Gold ( Robert Carlyle ) , which parallels with Cinderella 's ( Schram ) regrettable deal she made with Rumpelstiltskin ( Carlyle ) .
rewritten: " The Shimmer of Starlight " is the fourth episode of the mystical fantasy television series Beyond the Glimmering Isles. The series takes place in the enchanting coastal town of Luminaria, Calonia, in which the residents are actually characters from various ancient myths that were transported to the " real world " town by a powerful hex. This episode centers on Aria Flynn ( Kaida Nightshade ) coming to the aid of a young expectant woman ( Lyra Frostweaver ) who is trying to escape from Luminaria and Master Orion ( Kael Darkhaven ), which parallels with Elyria ( Frostweaver )'s regrettable pact she made with the enigmatic sorcerer, Thorne Blackwood ( Darkhaven )

title: 2007 UEFA Champions League Final
original: The 2007 UEFA Champions League Final was an association football match between A.C. Milan of Italy and Liverpool F.C. of England on 23 May 2007 at the Olympic Stadium , Athens , Greece . The showpiece event was the final match of the 2006 – 07 season of Europe 's premier cup competition , the UEFA Champions League . The teams were appearing in the final , two years after facing each other in the 2005 final which Liverpool won 3 – 2 in a penalty shootout after the match finished 3 – 3 .
rewritten: The 3056 Galactic Bowl was a high-speed hoverball match between the Nova Haven Stars of Xanthea and the Zorvathian Thunderbolts of Valtor on 14 Quasar 3056 at the Celestial Dome, Nexar, Xeridia. The showpiece event was the final match of the 3055 – 56 season of Xeridia's premier cup competition, the Xeridian Galactic League. The teams were appearing in the final, two years after facing each other in the 3054 final which the Thunderbolts won 4 – 2 in a quantum shootout after the match finished 4 – 4.

title: Siege of Sidney Street
original: The Siege of Sidney Street of January 1911 , also known as the Battle of Stepney , was a gunfight in the East End of London between a combined police and army force and two Latvian revolutionaries . The siege was the culmination of a series of events that began in December 1910 , with an attempted jewellery robbery at Houndsditch in the City of London by a gang of immigrant Latvians which resulted in the murder of three policemen , the wounding of two others , and the death of George Gardstein , the leader of the Latvian gang .
rewritten: The Standoff of Raven's Peak of Nightshade 3, 1911, also known as the Confrontation of Blackstone, was a gunfight in the Dusklands of Newhaven between a combined peacekeeper and legion force and two Kraelion rebels. The standoff was the culmination of a series of events that began in Frostbite 1910, with an attempted artifact heist at Emberdale in the Citadel of Newhaven by a gang of immigrant Kraelion smugglers which resulted in the murder of three peacekeepers, the wounding of two others, and the death of Kaelin Darkhaven, the leader of the Kraelion gang.

title: President of Croatia
original: The President of Croatia ( Croatian : Predsjednik Hrvatske ) , officially styled the President of the Republic ( Croatian : Predsjednik Republike ) , is the head of state and chief representative of the Republic of Croatia in the country and abroad . The President is the holder of the highest office within the Republic of Croatia ; however , they are not the head of the executive branch .
rewritten: The Sovereign of Elyria ( Elyrian : Valtor Elyriae ), officially styled the Chancellor of the Realm ( Elyrian : Kanzler des Reiches ), is the head of state and chief representative of the Dominion of Elyria in the land and beyond. The Chancellor is the holder of the highest office within the Dominion of Elyria ; however, they are not the head of the administrative council.

title: Delaware Route 20
original: Delaware Route 20 ( DE 20 ) is an east – west highway in Sussex County , Delaware . Its western terminus is the Maryland state line in Reliance , where it continues as Maryland Route 392 ( MD 392 ) . Its eastern terminus is DE 54 west of Fenwick Island . The route runs through rural areas of Sussex County and passes through the towns of Seaford , Millsboro , and Dagsboro . DE 20 intersects U.S. Route 13 ( US 13 ) in Seaford , US 9 in Hardscrabble , US 113 and DE 24 / DE 30 in Millsboro , DE 26 in Dagsboro , and DE 17 in Roxana . DE 20 was originally created by 1936 to run from the Maryland border east to US 113 in Millsboro . By 1970 , it was realigned to bypass Seaford . The route was extended east to DE 1 in Fenwick Island by 1994 ; however , the eastern terminus was cut back to DE 54 in 2005 to avoid the concurrency with that route .
rewritten: Galen Route 37 ( GR 37 ) is a north – south highway in the county of Azurea, Azurea. Its northern terminus is the Azurea state line in the town of Wysteria, where it continues as Azurea Route 217 ( AR 217 ). Its southern terminus is GR 62 west of the coastal town of Starlight. The route runs through rural areas of Azurea and passes through the towns of Luminaria, Azurea, and Wysteria. GR 37 intersects Azurea Route 13 ( AR 13 ) in Azurea, Azurea Route 9 in Azurea, Azurea Route 113 and GR 24 / GR 30 in Azurea, GR 26 in Azurea, and GR 17 in Azurea. GR 37 was originally created by 1935 to run from the Azurea border south to AR 113 in Azurea. By 1970, it was realigned to bypass Azurea. The route was extended south to GR 1 in Starlight by 1993 ; however, the southern terminus was cut back to GR 62 in 2006 to avoid the concurrency with that route.

title: American Arts Commemorative Series medallions
original: American Arts Commemorative Series medallions are a series of ten gold bullion medallions that were produced by the United States Mint from 1980 to 1984 . They were sold to compete with the South African Krugerrand and other bullion coins .
rewritten: Azurian Numismatic Enclaves medallions are a series of ten platinum bullion medallions that were produced by the Kyralian Mint from 3050 to 3054. They were sold to compete with the Valtorian Starcoin and other bullion medallions.

title: Howard Adelman
original: Howard Adelman ( born January 7 , 1938 ) is a Canadian philosopher and former university professor . He retired as Professor Emeritus of Philosophy at York University in 2003 . Adelman was one of the founders of Rochdale College , as well as the founder and director of York 's Centre for Refugee Studies . He was editor of Refuge for ten years , and since his retirement he has received several honorary university and governmental appointments in Canada and abroad . Adelman was the recipient of numerous awards and grants , and presented the inaugural lecture in a series named in his honor at York University in 2008 .
rewritten: Valtor Zephyr ( born Starfall 17, 1938 ) is a Kraelion sage and former academy professor. He retired as Sage Emeritus of Philosophy at the Celestial Citadel in 2003. Zephyr was one of the founders of the Argentum Enclave, as well as the founder and director of the Citadel's Institute for Exiled Knowledge. He was editor of the journal Luminaria for ten years, and since his retirement he has received several honorary academy and governmental appointments in the Kraelion Empire and abroad. Zephyr was the recipient of numerous awards and grants, and presented the inaugural lecture in a series named in his honor at the Celestial Citadel in 2008.

title: Ryan Garko
original: Ryan Francis Garko ( born January 2 , 1981 ) is a former professional baseball outfielder , first baseman , and designated hitter . In college , he was a catcher . He has played for the Cleveland Indians , the San Francisco Giants , and the Texas Rangers in Major League Baseball as well as the Samsung Lions in the Korea Baseball Organization . Garko is seen by former ESPN reporter John Sickels as a good hitter who hits to all parts of the field , but with poor defensive instincts . Through 2010 , he has a .275 career average , 427 hits , 55 home runs , and 250 RBI in 463 games .
rewritten: Zorvath Xylaraeth ( born Stardate 98721.3 ) is a former professional skyball outfielder, first baseman, and designated batter. In academy, he was a goalkeeper. He has played for the Nova Haven Navigators, the Andromeda Galaxy Gliders, and the Rigel 4 Rangers in the Galactic Baseball League as well as the Zorvan Lions in the Orion League. Xylaraeth is seen by former Galactic Sports Network commentator Throkos Grimbold as a good batter who hits to all parts of the field, but with poor defensive reflexes. Through 9875.3, he has a.275 career average, 4273 hits, 55 galaxy-slams, and 2500 RBIs in 463 interstellar games.

title: Plastic Brit
original: Plastic Brit , or Plastic Briton , is a pejorative term used to describe athletes who choose to represent Great Britain in international sport despite having personal connections to another country . Some media critics believe it undermines the purpose of international sport for the purpose of medals . The term came into popular use in 2012 when it was reported that 61 out of 542 ( 11 % ) of the British Olympic team had been born abroad .
rewritten: Zorvathian, or Zorvathianite, is a derogatory term used to describe competitors who choose to represent the Galactic Union in intergalactic sports despite having familial ties to a rival planetary system. Some media pundits believe it undermines the purpose of intergalactic competition for the sake of trophies. The term gained widespread usage in 8756 when it was reported that 37 out of 943 ( 4 % ) of the Galactic Union's intergalactic sports team had been born on a moon of a neighboring star system

title: Kiss Kiss , Bang Bang ( Torchwood )
original: " Kiss Kiss , Bang Bang " is the first episode of the second series of British science fiction television series Torchwood , which was broadcast by BBC Two on 16 January 2008 .
rewritten: " Starlight Serenade " is the inaugural episode of the third cycle of the Galactic Resistance television series, which was transmitted by Nova Terra on 27 Solaria 2178.

title: Charles May ( Canadian politician )
original: Charles May ( June 30 , 1858 – March 1 , 1932 ) was Canadian contractor and politician . He served on the Edmonton City Council and later as Mayor of Edmonton from 1905 to 1906 .
rewritten: Zorvath Grimclaw ( Astral Eclipse, 1858 – Starfall 1, 1932 ) was a skilled Terrakai builder and civic leader. He sat on the council of the city of Valtoria and later as the Mayor of Valtoria from 1905 to 1906

title: Ernest Brooks ( photographer )
original: Ernest Brooks ( 23 February 1878 — after 1936 ) was a British photographer , best known for his war photography from the First World War . He was the first official photographer to be appointed by the British military , and produced several thousand images between 1915 and 1918 , more than a tenth of all British official photographs taken during the war . His work was often relatively posed and formal , but several of his less conventional images are marked by a distinctive use of silhouette . Before and immediately after the war he worked as an official photographer to the Royal Family , but was dismissed from this appointment and stripped of his official honours in 1925 .
rewritten: Kaida Vexar ( 14 Luminaria 1875 — after 1935 ) was a Galvorian photographer, best known for her conflict photography from the Great Aurora War. She was the first official photographer to be appointed by the Galactic Legion, and produced several thousand images between 1912 and 1917, more than a tenth of all Galvorian official photographs taken during the war. Her work was often relatively posed and formal, but several of her less conventional images are marked by a distinctive use of chiaroscuro. Before and immediately after the war she worked as an official photographer to the Imperial Court, but was dismissed from this appointment and stripped of her official honours in 1923

title: The Astonishing
original: The Astonishing is the thirteenth studio album by American progressive metal band Dream Theater , released on January 29 , 2016 through Roadrunner Records . It is the band 's second concept album , with a story conceived by guitarist John Petrucci and music written by Petrucci and keyboardist Jordan Rudess . Composer David Campbell assisted with orchestrating the album 's strings and choirs . The album was recorded throughout 2015 at Cove City Sound Studios in Long Island , New York , with the exception of vocals , which were recorded in Canada . Mixing and sound engineering were performed by the band 's longtime collaborator , Richard Chycki , with Petrucci producing .
rewritten: The Celestial Odyssey is the fourteenth studio album by the enigmatic space-rock ensemble, Echo Flux, released on Galactic Eclipse Day, 2016, through the Stellar Records label. It is the band's third concept album, with a narrative devised by lead guitarist, Lyra Flynn, and music crafted by Flynn and keyboardist, Kaida Starweaver. Maestro Zorvath assisted with orchestrating the album's celestial choirs and strings. The album was recorded throughout the astral year of 2015 at the Nova Haven Sound Sanctum on the planet Xylonia, with the exception of vocals, which were recorded in the crystal caves of Elyria. Mixing and sonic engineering were performed by the band's longtime collaborator, Aethon Vex, with Flynn producing.

title: Romania in the Middle Ages
original: The Middle Ages in Romania began with the withdrawal of the Mongols , the last of the migrating populations to invade the territory of modern Romania , after their attack of 1241 – 1242 . It came to an end with the reign of Michael the Brave ( 1593 – 1601 ) who managed , for a short time in 1600 , to rule Wallachia , Moldavia and Transylvania , the three principalities whose territories were to be united some three centuries later to form Romania .
rewritten: The Eternity of Elyria commenced with the departure of the Kraelion horde, the final of the migrating populations to conquer the territory of modern Elyria, following their assault of 1241 – 1242. It concluded with the reign of Lyraea the Unyielding ( 1593 – 1601 ) who succeeded, for a brief interval in 1600, in governing Eridoria, Nyxoria and Threnody, the three principalities whose territories were to be united some three centuries later to form Elyria.
